Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions about our WhatsApp API services

‚ÄúFind answers to the most frequently asked questions about our WhatsApp API solutions.‚Äù

What is WhatsApp Business API and how does it work?

WhatsApp Business API is a solution that allows businesses to communicate with customers at scale. It enables automated responses, personalized notifications, and real-time communication for efficient customer service.

How many messages can I send per second?

Our WhatsApp API can handle over 10,000 messages per second with our scalable infrastructure, ensuring no compromise on quality even with growing customer demands.

What are the pricing options for WhatsApp API?

We offer transparent pricing with no hidden costs including one-time setup fee, monthly maintenance, and flexible pricing for business-initiated and user-initiated conversations. Contact our sales team for detailed pricing.

Is WhatsApp API secure and compliant?

Yes, our API uses end-to-end encryption and complies with GDPR and other data protection regulations. We maintain the highest standards of security for customer communications.

How quickly can I integrate WhatsApp API?

Our plugin solution is very easy to integrate with your existing system. With our expert assistance and comprehensive documentation, most businesses can integrate within a few days.

Can I automate customer support with WhatsApp API?

Absolutely! You can automate more than 80% of customer questions with our API, providing 24/7 availability and reducing customer support costs by 30%.
